name: Ticking bomb
objective: Put the %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs into the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron in ascending order. First egg 0 then 1 etc.
loss_reason_wrong_egg_order: You put some %%icon icon-egg$%% egg into the %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron in the wrong order or at the same time as another. You must put them one by one in ascending order into the cauldron.
